title: Building judgment before adolescence raises stakes
description: Building judgment before adolescence raises stakes
content:
Scenario: Building judgment before adolescence raises stakes
    Given Emma is practicing value decisions ages 8-10
    And adolescence will bring higher-stakes choices
    When Emma develops decision-making skills through scanner
    Then she should build capacity while consequences are manageable
    And judgment should be practiced in low-risk context
    And she should develop value literacy before teen years
    And safe practice should prepare her for Real Responsibility phase (11-13)
    And developmental progression should scaffold increasing autonomy
    And early practice should enable later capability
